data.name: Highrise City Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Gerrit Wolf produced an original Soundtrack for Highrise City which currently contains 19 Tracks featuring a chilling experience. From electronic vibes to relaxing guitar tracks the OST is the perfect mix for those who want to relax a bit - not only while creating a metropolis.
data.about_the_game: Gerrit Wolf produced an original Soundtrack for Highrise City which currently contains 19 Tracks featuring a chilling experience. From electronic vibes to relaxing guitar tracks the OST is the perfect mix for those who want to relax a bit - not only while creating a metropolis.
data.short_description: The Original Soundtrack for Highrise City contains 19 tracks composed, mixed and mastered by Gerrit Wolf.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1500 MB available space
